name: Wasteland Scrappers
description:
In this post-apocalyptic world only the strong survive. If you're going to defeat anyone who comes in your way, you better use everything you have at your disposal!

Click weapons on your screen to move your character onto them. Click your enemy's weapons to fire at them. Whenever a weapon is hit, it becomes damaged, and you have to move onto it to repair it. After an opponent is defeated, pick one of their weapons to scrap and add it to your Tank.

In the over-world, press W to move forward, S to move backwards, and A/D to rotate.

This game was made as part of the 2021 Brackey's Game Jam. The theme was stronger together, which inspired us to make a game about using parts of your opponents vehicles in order to make yourself stronger. Bonus points to anyone who can find Pablo.
